content.question: A student conducts three experiments in which a cart of mass <math alttext="M " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is pushed along a horizontal surface of negligible friction for <math alttext="20 seconds " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>20</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> by an applied force. The graph shows the force as a function of time for each experiment. Which of the following correctly ranks the greatest change in the cartâ€™s momentum from <math alttext="0 seconds " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="20 seconds " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>20</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: Experiment <math alttext="3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="is greater than" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>></mo></mrow></mstyle></math> Experiment <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="is greater than" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>></mo></mrow></mstyle></math> Experiment <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

Experiment <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="is greater than" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>></mo></mrow></mstyle></math> Experiment <math alttext="3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="which greater than" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>></mo></mrow></mstyle></math> Experiment <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: Experiment <math alttext="3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="is equal to" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> Experiment <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="is equal to" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> Experiment <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
